4.0.0.name: com.unity.adaptiveperformance.oppo.android
4.0.0.description:
The Adaptive Performance oppo (Android) provider is a subsystem for Adaptive Performance to extend Adaptive Performance to Oppo Android devices. It transmits device-specific information to the Adaptive Performance system and enables you to receive data about the thermal state of a Oppo Android device. 

By installing this package, you agree to the terms and conditions of the Oppo GameSDK End User License Agreement found under "View licenses" above.

_upm.changelog: ### This is the first preview release of the *Adaptive Performance Oppo (Android)* package for *Adaptive Performance* which was integrated within Adaptive Performance previously.

name: com.unity.adaptiveperformance.oppo.android

The Adaptive Performance oppo (Android) provider is a subsystem for Adaptive Performance to extend Adaptive Performance to Oppo Android devices. It transmits device-specific information to the Adaptive Performance system and enables you to receive data about the thermal state of a Oppo Android device.
